ValidationRule.description: Loan Amount must be greater than $300,000 when Request Type is set to ‘Full Loan Presentation’ or 'Streamlined Loan Presentation'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.No_Validation__c = False, ISCHANGED(LLC_BI__Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Credit Underwriting"), LLC_BI__Amount__c < 300000, OR( ISPICKVAL(ffin_Request_Type__c, "Full Loan Presentation"), ISPICKVAL(ffin_Request_Type__c, "Streamlined Loan Presentation") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only deals that are greater than $300,000 can be requested for 'Full Loan Presentation' or 'Streamlined Loan Presentation'
